channel.title: Snippets section?
channel.description:
As seeing tutorial after tutorial getting locked in the tutorials section, for being unhelpful, short, and not very well explained.
Should we have a snippets section? (Sub forum under, private client hacking and RS2 Tut's)
My argument: [b]A)[/b] Look at the private client hacking(all the questions and snippets posted there) and the RS2 Tutorials (half the page is locked and is useless junk)
[b]B)[/b]The [b]Snippets STICKY[/b] The last post was in December 09 and was started in Dec 08, and doesn't even have past 1 page of posts (from this point).
With that being said, as 459, 474, 508, 525, 562's being developed shouldn't we start expanding past the classic-377 era?
Discuss.

item.title: Snippets section?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:11, topic:333114”]Yo, i love how this community is absence to change.

Yes its a learning community, but snippets you can learn from also. When you have a snippet showing the lets say showing the method used to load 474 animations. Then you learn a lot compared to a 317 method.[/quote]

We aren’t absence to change. The majority of the community doesn’t want a million boards on the homepage. With each new section comes a new set of rules and rule breakers. I have the feeling you are assuming that by adding a snippet section, magically all of the short tutorials that don’t require any knowledge to follow will turn up in the child board.

@Anyone who wants a 508+ section: create a decent one first.

Read full topic

item.title: Snippets section?

item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:333114”][quote author=WowILikeToCode link=topic=429530.msg3154203#msg3154203 date=1268861230]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=429530.msg3154200#msg3154200 date=1268861131]

Yo, i already talked about it. It was last updated june 29th, 2009.
[/quote]Yo, it don’t matter when it was last updated, because people can still look through the pages and find what they need.

yes its much like browsing the pages of the tutorials section except its browsing the pages of a post…

[/quote]Yo dog you took the words outta my mouth[/quote]

I was just elaborating what you had already explained.

Read full topic

item.title: Snippets section?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:4, topic:333114”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=429530.msg3153932#msg3153932 date=1268828602]
Suggestions

Also, it’s been argued many times before. “We’re not “lowering” our self to such a state” is what the reason was IIRC. The fact that it takes little to know knowledge to copy and past gives the snippet idea a negative perspective.
[/quote]

Our forums are outdated. And if we are going to lock and flood our forums with these, might as well add a child board.[/quote]As far as I can remember, the motto behind development here has been to learn something (hence the Tutorial Section in the past). Contrary to popular belief, Moparscape is a forum for learning, not for C&P.

Read full topic

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:333114”]Suggestions

Also, it’s been argued many times before. “We’re not “lowering” our self to such a state” is what the reason was IIRC. The fact that it takes little to know knowledge to copy and past gives the snippet idea a negative perspective.[/quote]

Our forums are outdated. And if we are going to lock and flood our forums with these, might as well add a child board.
